metaDescription: Logo-only, kinetic, ridiculous—but clean. Hyperactive astronaut energy, zero cringe, professional craft. 3… 2… SEND.

hero.sub: Just an astronaut with too much energy. Launched fair on Pump.fun.

items.p: No presale BS. No team tokens. Everyone gets in the same way.
Buy, sell, transfer. No hidden fees. What you see is what you get.
We post memes. We say 'send it.' That's literally it.

narrativeBurst.title: Origin Story
narrativeBurst.body: Some guy made an astronaut meme. People liked it. Now we're here. That's the whole story.
